sentences.en: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.cn: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

sentences.en: Acute appendicitis usually develops without relation to the ingestion of food.
sentences.cn: 急性阑尾炎的发生通常与饮食无关.

sentences.en: Britain threatened to break off diplomatic relations with the regime.
sentences.cn: 英国威胁要和该政权断绝外交关系。

sentences.en: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.cn: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.en: He had a relation who lived up the road.
sentences.cn: 他有个亲戚住在这条马路上。

sentences.en: He is a distant relation of mine.
sentences.cn: 他是我的远房亲戚.

sentences.en: I have a lot to say in relation to that affair.
sentences.cn: 关于那件事,我有很多话要讲.

sentences.en: I understand him to be a distant relation.
sentences.cn: 我知道他是一位远亲.

sentences.en: In the real world, the relation between inputsand outputs exhibits wide variety.
sentences.cn: 在现实世界中, 投入产出间关系表现出多种变化.

sentences.en: Maybe we can coordinate the relation of them.
sentences.cn: 或许我们可以调和他们之间的关系.

sentences.en: The money he'd been ordered to pay was minimal in relation to his salary.
sentences.cn: 他被要求支付的金额与他的薪水相比微不足道。

sentences.en: The price the meat is sold for bears no relation to (= is not connected to ) the price the farmer receives.
sentences.cn: 肉的售价和农民拿到的价格无关。

sentences.en: The project was outlined with relation to available funds.
sentences.cn: 这方案是根据可以获得的经费而拟定的.

sentences.en: The relation of disease to poverty and ignorance is easy to see.
sentences.cn: 疾病与贫穷、无知之间的关系是显而易见的.

sentences.en: there is an ambiguity in the provisions in relation to children's hearings.
sentences.cn: 关于儿童出席审讯的条款中有一意义不甚明确之处。

sentences.en: There were some mediate contacts between the two countries before their diplomatic relation was established.
sentences.cn: 在两国外交关系建立之前,已经有些间接的接触.

sentences.en: This theory bears no relation to reality.
sentences.cn: 这个理论和现实没什么联系。

sentences.en: Watercolour still seems somehow to be the poor relation of oil painting.
sentences.cn: 水彩画似乎仍比油画略逊一筹。

sentences.en: You are given a map so that you can see where your villa is in relation to the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 你会拿到一张地图，这样你就能了解自己的别墅与游泳池的相对位置。

sentences.en: You should be prepared to talk knowledgeably about the requirements of the position for which you are applying in relation to your own professional experiences and interests.
sentences.cn: 你应该准备有见地地去谈论你所求职位对求职者的要求,与你自身的职业经历和个人兴趣之间的联系.

words.tran_cn: 有关系的，有关联的；讲述的，叙述的
相对的；有关系的；成比例的
亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物
涉及；认同；符合；与…有某种联系

phrases.tran_cn: 色散关系；分散关系；频散关系

trans.tran_en: a connection between two or more things
